Description: Wooden shabti of Khamin with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face, a collar and crossed arms in relief holding two incised hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with nine rows of incised hieroglyphs containing chapter 6 from the Book of the Dead.
Dimensions: Height: 16.15 centimetres (object dimensions, excluding attached wooden block)
Height: 19 centimetres (object dimensions, including attached wooden block)
Width: 4.77 centimetres (object dimensions, excluding attached wooden block)
Depth: 3.03 centimetres (object dimensions, excluding attached wooden block)
Condition: fair - damage to back of head
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
